item.description: 5 Mile Run, 2 Mile Run, 2 Mile Fitness Walk & Kids Fun Run First Event starts at 9:30 $22.00 Registration Fee except for kids fun run $5.00 Fee changes to $25.00 after 3/17/2012 Strollers Welcomed! (someone will need to push it thou) Free T Shirts to the 1st 3,000 pre registered runners & walkers prior to 3/17. Stongly encourage pre registration prior to 3/17, otherwise shirts are available on a first come first served basis. http://bristolct.net/...
item.name: 10th Annual Shamrock Run & Walk
